# SCHEMATIC REFERENCE

![image](https://github.com/YuriXbr/ArduinoLedStripController/assets/56856513/eac60c62-ee10-48f8-b5f5-7f8a02ffd876)

0: 11111100
1: 01100000
2: 11011010
3: 11110010
4: 01100110
5: 10110110
6: 10111110
7: 11100000
8: 11111110
9: 11110110
A: 11101110
B: 00111110
C: 10011100
D: 01111010
E: 10011110
F: 10001110
G: 10111100
H: 01101110
I: 01100000
J: 01111000
K: 01101110
L: 00011100
M: 01010100
N: 00101010
O: 11111100
P: 11001110
Q: 11100110
R: 00001010
S: 10110110
T: 10011100
U: 01111100
V: 01111100
W: 01111100
X: 01101110
Y: 01110110
Z: 11011010
